extendedInfo.description: â Awarded as Best Musicians App 2011 âThrow away your song books and start jamming with GuitarTapp today! Search and view 500,000+ guitar tabs, chords, ChordPro files, power tabs, bass tabs and drum tabs. Has autoscroll feature, large chords dictionary with diagrams and variations, save, open and edit tabs on SD card, transpose songs, create setlists, jam along with local MP3's and watch YouTube video lessons.GuitarTapp is the only tab viewer capable of adjusting tabs to fit your screen's width, using the innovative IntelliWrap technique: this eliminates the need to scroll horizontally. You'll find no other app with so many features, NO additional purchases required, NO subscriptions, FREE tabs library updates.Main features:â Quickly find chords, guitar tabs, power tabs, bass tabs and drum tabs for 350,000+ songsâ Shows predictive search suggestionsâ Autoscroll: play along from the screen, using the song's duration to determine scroll speedâ On-board chord dictionary: view chord diagrams and fingering alternatives for hundreds of guitar and ukulele chords, includes left-handed support. â Able to play the chords for referenceâ Transpose: quickly change the song key by transposing the chords up or downâ IntelliWrap: eliminates horizontal scrolling by intelligently breaking up tabs and chords into screen-sized piecesâ Able to play text tablature for quick referenceâ Favorites: save tabs on your SD cardâ Setlists: create and manage setlists for live performancesâ Power Tab support (are converted to text tabs)â ChordPro rendering engine for PDF-alike scoresâ NEW metronomeâ Find songs or video lessons on YouTubeâ Save and load tabs to/from SD card, and edit them!â Open your own filesâ 'White on black' option available for tab viewing; reduces battery consumption for some screensâ Portrait and landscape modes supportedâ Adjustable tabs font sizeâ Supports tablets: very useful as teleprompter / autocue for live performances on stageâ Bluetooth pedals support for handsfree scrolling, turning pages, loading next song on setlist etcâ Sync: synchronize your favorites and setlists to other devices running GuitarTappâ Send to e-mailBuy now and get unlimited access to Android's ultimate guitar tabs collection! Additional keywords: Guitar Tabs, OnSong, SongBook.â IMPORTANT: Please e-mail us if you run into a bug, or would like a feature to be added. Do NOT ask questions in a review, as we are unable to reply to you! â

reviews.title: Perfect app for setlist
reviews.comment: In this app I can edit, transpose, see chords, customize the look and upload my own songs. I have GT on my Lenovo ThinkPad tablet and it works great. The only thing that needs improving is when using ChordPro sometimes it takes several swipes to advance the page. On occasion it won\'t swipe at all. Two of my friends in our band have OnSong on their iPads and if they hadn\'t already purchased that app they would switch to GT.
reviews.author: Angela Snyder

reviews.title: GuitarTapp
reviews.comment: The best app for lyrics and music for ANY song or artist past and present without a doubt. This app would be a bargin at $100.00 even. Thanks guys.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: It does everything that i want and does it perfectly. Easily the best app and improving with each update. Thanks guys
reviews.author: Michael Butler

reviews.title: Spectacular
reviews.comment: Has access bands and songs I never would have expected. Excellent ability to download and customize your tabs and use them offline. Useful for playing songs too with their unique auto-scroll feature. Thank you for a great product, I bought the full version after 20 minutes browsing through the trial version.
reviews.author: Josh S

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Chordpro is the bomb. App is very nicely made overall. Beats everything else out there. Was an impulse buy for me but it was well worth it.
reviews.author: Vidula Nandasena

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: So far majority of songs I have wanted the tab for have been available via this app, and those that aren\'t is only because they are so new that no one has gotten around to posting yet. Gone from massive library of books to one little app & a wifi/mobile data connection. Beyond highly recommend this app
reviews.author: Rik Robinson

reviews.title: Very very useful in so many ways. It just keeps getting better.
reviews.comment: Such a handy tool. I love that it can be on my phone and tablet. Fairly sure it does much more than I realise. Thank you.
reviews.author: Jonathan Land

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Developer is constantly improving app. Two of my concerns were taken care of in the last revision. Jam with mp3 works well on Android. Works great with PageFlip bluetooth page turner, too. Thanks for a great app that makes performance much easier!
reviews.author: kathy brink

reviews.title: Absolutely awesome!
reviews.comment: This program was the best two bucks I\'ve ever spent on music!  If you\'re a beginner, it will help you learn how to play your favorite songs.  If you\'re a seasoned player, this will help you put together your favorite songs without having to lug around notebooks and sheet music.  Definitely worth the money!  Keep up the good work guys!
reviews.author: John Mota

reviews.comment: This app is great. Use it on kindel, kindel HD and archos tablets. CA anyone tell me how the blue tooth pedal works??\tGreat app use it on three different devices, recommend it to everyone.
reviews.author: Dominick Cafro

reviews.title: Most Used Music App
reviews.comment: This is the best music app that I use,  and I have bought quite a few.  It transposes,  easy to make your own sheets,  converts to pdf,  make your own setlists\342\200\246\342\200\246 I use this app a lot.  Really glad I bought it.
reviews.author: Mark Tymchak

reviews.title: Superb App
reviews.comment: I have the app on my Galaxy Note 2 and it works as it should,  I\'ve only been playing a short while and its helped me to learn and play loadsa songs. A+
reviews.author: PAUL Newman

reviews.title: A truly awesome tool
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this for live gigging for over a year now and it\'s never let me down.
reviews.author: Mark Wake

reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t ask for a better app this Guitar Tapp Pro is definitely the best guitar app I have found yet, install it. Pay and become a rock star that very day:D supper happy about this app. Definitely worth every penny and then some.
reviews.author: Kyoletia Thomason

reviews.title: Just brilliant
reviews.comment: This is one if my favourite apps, I love the ease of use and it has access to almost every song. Just one wee suggestion; on my Samsung S3, when I hit \"search\"  in this app, my keyboard doesn\'t automatically appear as it should do. Fix thus and I\'ll give this app 10 stars!
reviews.author: Gerard Mc Kay

reviews.comment: best guitar tabs app out there. loads of songs, easy to read tabs/chords, you can create setlists and best of all, sync between devices.  really stable too. Definitely worth getting.\tObsessed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If you want to learn, or better your self! You can\'t get any better an app ,than guitar tapp.\tGreat for beginners like me And handy for professionals like you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: The developers keep updating this app to address issues, which is good. Very happy. Use it every week. Would be good if there could be a history including songs in the favorites, and if the typed search disappeared after each search, to make the next search quicker.
reviews.author: Jared Hyams

reviews.title: The Go-to App for Tabs
reviews.comment: It works perfectly. I update phones but always install this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best App
reviews.comment: This is the best tab app! Great library of songs. Of the hundreds of random songs I\'ve searched for, very few have failed.
reviews.author: Sergio Campo
